metadata.name: Shimmering Hues #1
metadata.description:
Staged in a dreamlike world in the form of a shimmering rain, the photo series create hypnotic moments straight from a dream. Colorful, dramatic, mesmerizing... brings us back to the center of our most intimate thoughts.... shimmering in many colors... shimmering hues.

An intersection between conceptual art and fashion, my goal as a photographer is to transform the ordinary into an extraordinary. 

Shimmering Hues #1
Artist: Rhea Prokop
